name: olinapps
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebookincubator/create-react-app).

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.debug: concurrently "cd server && npm run debug" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install

author: Franton Lin
